chapter.title: Vampyre Imaging Library Future
chapter.par: Apart from main Imaging release there will be extra package with more demos, extensions, and other stuff. One of the extensions will be JPEG2000 support. It is not native Pascal (uses C object files) yet so it won't be intergrated to Imaging core. This package should be released in few months.

In the long term I'm planning to redesign and rewrite major parts of library in future to make it more compact and easier to use and extend. First version of this new design should be 0.30 (probably in late 2007) but few more versions based on old design should be released before that.
Here is a list of some of the features I want to include in future Imaging releases:

bulletlist.li: extend canvas class (more effects, blended drawing, drawing of various primitives)
